sentence.text: Probenecid may decrease renal tubular secretion of cephalosporins when used concurrently, resulting in increased and more prolonged cephalosporin blood levels.

Drug/Laboratory Test Interactions A false positive reaction for glucose in the urine may occur with Benedicts solution, Fehlings solution or with CLINITEST? tablets, but not with enzyme-based tests such as CLINISTIX?.
sentence.negationtags: Drug/Laboratory Test Interactions A false positive reaction for glucose in the urine may occur with Benedicts solution, Fehlings solution or with CLINITEST? tablets, but <xcope><cue>not</cue> with enzyme-based tests such as CLINISTIX?</xcope>.

sentence.text: Positive direct and indirect antiglobulin (Coombs) tests have occurred;
these may also occur in neonates whose mothers received cephalosporins before delivery.
